name: data_plt_module_id
comment: Cummins module identifier (EN=0x454E for CM550/VP44 family)

name: jcthkctd_calc_input
comment: JCTHKCTD throttle kickdown calculation input variable

name: param_scaling_factor
comment: Parameter scaling factor used in calculations

name: asthrfes_calc_input
comment: ASTHRFES throttle position speed calculation input variable

name: cached_parameter_value
comment: Cached parameter value for diagnostic responses

name: diagnostic_status_register
comment: Diagnostic operation status and mode flags

name: diagnostic_message_state
comment: J1939 diagnostic message processing state buffer

name: diagnostic_response_buffer
comment: J1939 diagnostic response message buffer pointer

name: param_ref_base
comment: Parameter reference base (lookup table for param_lookup_1)

name: j1939_tx_msg_buffer
comment: J1939 transmission message buffer with data and header

name: param_system_mode
comment: Current parameter system operation mode (1=active 11=cached etc)

name: circular_buffer_write_index
comment: Circular buffer write index (512 entries max)

name: circular_buffer_count
comment: Number of entries in circular buffer

name: system_logging_state
comment: System data logging state flag (1=active 2=error mode)

name: can_message_buffer_start
comment: Start of CAN message buffer array for logging (906 bytes)

name: can_message_buffer_end
comment: End marker for CAN message buffer logging range

name: memory_patch_array
comment: Memory patch descriptor array (6 bytes per entry: addr size data)

name: patch_data_source
comment: Source data buffer for memory patching operations

name: memory_patch_count
comment: Number of memory patches to apply (max 10)
